name: [0].DUTY_CYCLE
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload[0].DUTY_CYCLE;
return msg;

name: Duty Cycle abfragen und im Dashboard anzeigen
info:
Dieser Flow fragt in Intervallen 
von 30 sekunden den Duty Cycle des 
ersten Funk-Interfaces des BidCos-RF
Schnittstellenprozess ("rfd") per RPC ab 
und visualisiert ihn in Node-RED Dashboard.

name: Dashboard Dropdown für Anwesenheit- und Alarm-Variable
Anzahl und Liste von nicht erreichbaren Geräten im Dashboard anzeigen
Zeitstempel formatieren
Liste erzeugen
func:
msg.payload = msg.topics.join(', ');
return msg;

connect/lost/change

return msg;

name: initialize
save
setup values
set topic

bose add systems

name: pause
format:
<md-button class="metal linear black-text fa fa-pause" ng-click='send({
payload: [
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "POST",
        "function": "key",
        "keyState": "press",
        "key": "PAUSE",
        "notification": "Paused"
    }
]
})'></md-button>

name: previous
format:
<md-button class="metal linear black-text fa fa-step-backward" ng-click='send({
payload: [
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "POST",
        "function": "key",
        "keyState": "press",
        "key": "PREV_TRACK",
        "notification": "Previous track"
    },
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "POST",
        "function": "key",
        "keyState": "press",
        "key": "PLAY"
    }
]
})'></md-button>

name: next
format:
<md-button class="metal linear black-text fa fa-step-forward" ng-click='send({
payload: [
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "POST",
        "function": "key",
        "keyState": "press",
        "key": "NEXT_TRACK",
        "notification": "Next track"
    },
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "POST",
        "function": "key",
        "keyState": "press",
        "key": "PLAY"
    }
]
})'></md-button>

name: volume down
format:
<md-button class="metal linear black-text fa fa-volume-down" ng-click='send({
payload: [
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "GET",
        "function": "volume"
    },
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "POST",
        "function": "volume",
        "option": "offset",
        "volume": -1,
        "delay": "300",
        "volumeNotification": "true"
    }
]
})'></md-button>

name: volume up
format:
<md-button class="metal linear black-text fa fa-volume-up" ng-click='send({
payload: [
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "GET",
        "function": "volume"
    },
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "POST",
        "function": "volume",
        "option": "offset",
        "volume": 10,
        "delay": "300",
        "volumeNotification": "true"
    }
]
})'></md-button>

name: now playing
format:
<md-button class="metal linear black-text fa fa-info-circle" aria-label="Settings" ng-click='send({
payload: [
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "GET",
        "function": "now_playing"
    },
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "GET",
        "function": "getZone"
    }
]
})'></md-button>

name: play
format:
<md-button class="metal linear black-text fa fa-play" ng-click='send({
payload : [
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "POST",
        "function": "key",
        "keyState": "press",
        "key": "PLAY",
        "volumeNotification": "true"
    }
]
})'></md-button>

name: shuffle control
format:
<md-button class="metal linear black-text fa fa-random" ng-click='send({
payload: [
    {
        "group": {
            "show": [
                "Bose_Soundtouch_Shuffle"
            ],
            "focus": "true"
        }
    }
]
})'></md-button>

name: repeat control
format:
<md-button class="metal linear black-text fa fa-repeat" ng-click='send({
payload: [
    {
        "group": {
            "show": [
                "Bose_Soundtouch_Repeat"
            ],
            "focus": "true"
        }
    }
]
})'></md-button>

name: button css
format:
<style>

  .md-button.black-text {
    color: black;
  }

  /* Metal ------------------------- */
  
  .metal {
    position: relative;
    margin: auto;
    
    text-align: center;
    color: hsla(0,0%,20%,1);
    text-shadow:
      hsla(0,0%,40%,.5) 0 -1px 0,
      hsla(0,0%,100%,.6) 0 2px 1px;
    
    background-color: hsl(0,0%,90%);
    box-shadow:
      inset hsla(0,0%,15%,  1) 0  0px 0px 2px, /* border */
      inset hsla(0,0%,15%, .8) 0 -1px 3px 2px, /* soft SD */
      inset hsla(0,0%,0%, .25) 0 -1px 0px 3px, /* bottom SD */
      inset hsla(0,0%,100%,.7) 0  2px 1px 3px, /* top HL */
      
      hsla(0,0%, 0%,.15) 0 -2px 3px 2px, /* outer SD */
      hsla(0,0%,100%,.5) 0  2px 3px 2px; /* outer HL */ 

    transition: color .2s;
  }
  
  /* Linear ------------------------- */

  .metal.linear {
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    font-size: 1.2em;
    border-radius: .5em;
    background-image:
      -webkit-repeating-linear-gradient(left, hsla(0,0%,100%,0) 0%, hsla(0,0%,100%,0)   6%, hsla(0,0%,100%, .1) 7.5%),
      -webkit-repeating-linear-gradient(left, hsla(0,0%,  0%,0) 0%, hsla(0,0%,  0%,0)   4%, hsla(0,0%,  0%,.03) 4.5%),
      -webkit-repeating-linear-gradient(left, hsla(0,0%,100%,0) 0%, hsla(0,0%,100%,0) 1.2%, hsla(0,0%,100%,.15) 2.2%),
      
      linear-gradient(180deg,
      hsl(0,0%,78%)  0%, 
      hsl(0,0%,90%) 47%, 
      hsl(0,0%,78%) 53%,
      hsl(0,0%,70%)100%);
  }
    
  /* Wide ------------------------- */

  .metal.wide {
    width: 90px;
    height: 40px;
  }

  /* active ------------------------- */

  .metal:active {
    color: hsl(210, 100%, 40%);
    text-shadow:
      hsla(210,100%,20%,.3) 0 -1px 0,
      hsl(210,100%,85%) 0 2px 1px,
      hsla(200,100%,80%,1) 0 0 5px,
      hsla(210,100%,50%,.6) 0 0 20px;
    box-shadow: 
      inset hsla(210,100%,30%,  1) 0  0px 0px 2px, /* border */
      inset hsla(210,100%,15%, .4) 0 -1px 3px 2px, /* soft SD */
      inset hsla(210,100%,20%,.25) 0 -1px 0px 3px, /* bottom SD */
      inset hsla(210,100%,100%,.7) 0  2px 1px 3px, /* top HL */
      
      hsla(210,100%,75%, .8) 0  0px 3px 2px, /* outer SD */
      hsla(210,50%,40%, .25) 0 -2px 3px 2px, /* outer SD */
      hsla(210,80%,95%,   1) 0  2px 3px 2px; /* outer HL */
  }   

</style>

name: group control
format:
<md-button class="metal linear black-text fa fa-rss" ng-click='send({
payload: [
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "GROUP",
        "function": "setup",
        "group": {
            "show": [
                "Bose_Soundtouch_Group"
            ],
            "focus": "true"
        }
    }
]
})'></md-button>

name: + group
format:
<md-button ng-disabled="msg.payload" class="metal linear black-text fa fa-plus" ng-click='send({
payload: [
    {
        "name": "select",
        "method": "GROUP",
        "function": "add",
    }
]
})'></md-button>

name: - group

payload: [

        "method": "GROUP",
        "function": "remove"
    }
]
})'></md-button>

name: cancel group

<md-button class="metal linear wide black-text" ng-click='send({
payload: [
    {

            "hide": [

            ]
        }
    }
]
})'>Cancel</md-button>
